String.string: We can't let the argons hold our people.
Words of gratitude seem inadequate to the miracle you wrought.
Meet {@LinkCreature:246#3002#Arnan} at {@Rgn:46015$$Hexheart Chamber} in the {@Rgn:46002$$Raga Evala}.
Operate the transmogrification pod controls west of the camp to rescue the prisoner, and then use the teleport scroll.
Operate the transmogrification pod controls west of the camp to rescue the prisoner, and then use the teleport scroll.
